mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM SafeManageRules WHERE orgid =#{orgid}
SELECT SafeManageRulesID, SafeManageRulesName, UploadTime, SafeManageRulesType, filePath, orgid FROM SafeManageRules WHERE orgid =#{orgid} limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
SELECT orgid, SafeManageRulesName, SafeManageRulesType, filepath FROM SafeManageRules WHERE SafeManageRulesID = #{safeManageRulesID}
